com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener
    Deprecated.

    public class Window
extends FContainer
    basic class for drag and drop using prototype js framework try to keep JS as slim as possible, i.e. avoid prototype.js use FDesktop, FDragAndDrop instead
    Author:
    hv
